With every exhibit, I met and worked with talented people who taught me something new” ~ Graduate Student, Coral Doyle.Love Museums? Here’s how to earn a Certificate or Masters Degree in Museum Studies at CSU, ChicoThe Museum Studies program at CSU, Chico is one of the premiere hands-on museology programs in the United States. Museum Studies Courses Include:Exhibit Research, Design, and InstallationCollections ManagementMuseum EducationMuseum AdministrationLearn About the Museum Studies ProgramCollege of Behavioral & Social SciencesButte Hall, Room 701530-898-6171bss@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/bssSupport Our CollegeProgram PortfolioBSS Majors & ProgramsAnthropologyChild DevelopmentEconomicsGeography & PlanningPublic Health & Health Services AdministrationMulticultural & Gender StudiesPolitical Science & Criminal JusticePsychologySocial ScienceSocial WorkSociology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
